service.query:
SELECT SUBSTR(SALE_ORG_CD,1,2)||'00000000' STR_CD, C.ORG_NAME STR_NAME, SUBSTR(SALE_ORG_CD,1,4)||'000000' DEPT_CD, D.ORG_NAME DEPT_NAME, SUBSTR(SALE_ORG_CD,1,6)||'0000' TEAM_CD, E.ORG_NAME TEAM_NAME, SUBSTR(SALE_ORG_CD,1,8)||'00' PC_CD, F.ORG_NAME PC_NAME, M_PUMBUN_CD1, A.PUMBUN_CD, PUMBUN_NM, BRAND_TYPE,EVENT_FLAG,MG_RATE, SUM(ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT) ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT, SUM(TOT_SALE_AMT) TOT_SALE_AMT,SUM(SALE_PROF_AMT) SALE_PROF_AMT,SUM(P_TOT_SALE_AMT) P_TOT_SALE_AMT,SUM(ELO_RATE) ELO_RATE,SUM(PROFRATE) PROFRATE, PUMBUN_ORDER,F.SORT_ORDER ,(CASE WHEN SUM(NVL(ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT,0)) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ( SUM(NVL(TOT_SALE_AMT,0))/SUM(NVL(ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT,0)))*100 END) ACHIEVERATE --달성율 , (CASE WHEN (SUM(SUM(NVL(TOT_SALE_AMT,0))) OVER ()) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (SUM(NVL(TOT_SALE_AMT,0)) / (SUM(SUM(NVL(TOT_SALE_AMT,0))) OVER ())*100) END) AS TOT_COMP_RATE --구성비 ,SUM(CUST_CNT) CUST_CNT -- 객수 ,ROUND((CASE WHEN SUM(CUST_CNT) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (SUM(TOT_SALE_AMT)/SUM(CUST_CNT)) END),0) AS CUST_DANGA -- 객단가 ,SUM(CUST_CNT1) CUST_CNT1 -- 대비객수 , (CASE WHEN (SUM(SUM(NVL(P_TOT_SALE_AMT,0))) OVER ()) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (SUM(NVL(P_TOT_SALE_AMT,0)) / (SUM(SUM(NVL(P_TOT_SALE_AMT,0))) OVER ())*100) END) AS TOT_COMP_RATE1 --대비구성비 , (CASE WHEN SUM(NVL(P_TOT_SALE_AMT,0)) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ((SUM(NVL(TOT_SALE_AMT,0))- SUM(NVL(P_TOT_SALE_AMT,0)))/SUM(NVL(P_TOT_SALE_AMT,0)))*100 END) AS SALEIRATE1 --신장율 FROM (SELECT REP_PUMBUN_CD M_PUMBUN_CD1 ,PUMBUN_CD, PUMBUN_NM, DECODE(BRAND_TYPE,'정','정규','행','행사','온','온라인','복','복지','임','임시','N','네이버','행사구분맵핑오류') BRAND_TYPE, EVENT_FLAG,MG_RATE, ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT, TOT_SALE_AMT,SALE_PROF_AMT, P_TOT_SALE_AMT, CASE WHEN P_TOT_SALE_AMT = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((TOT_SALE_AMT - P_TOT_SALE_AMT)/P_TOT_SALE_AMT*100,2) END ELO_RATE, PROFRATE, DECODE(BRAND_TYPE,'정','1','행','2','온','3','복','4','임','5','N','6','7') PUMBUN_ORDER, CUST_CNT, CUST_CNT1 FROM (SELECT PUMBUN_CD,REP_PUMBUN_CD, CASE WHEN INSTR(PUMBUN_NAME,'(') = 0 THEN PUMBUN_NAME ELSE SUBSTR(PUMBUN_NAME,1,INSTR(PUMBUN_NAME,'(')-1) END PUMBUN_NM, SUBSTR(PUMBUN_NAME,INSTR(PUMBUN_NAME,'(')+1,1) BRAND_TYPE , NVL(EVENT_FLAG, ' ')AS EVENT_FLAG , MG_RATE , ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT , TOT_SALE_AMT , SALE_PROF_AMT , PROFRATE , P_TOT_SALE_AMT , CUST_CNT , CUST_CNT1 FROM (SELECT PUMBUN_CD,REP_PUMBUN_CD,PUMBUN_NAME,MAX(EVENT_FLAG) EVENT_FLAG,MAX(MG_RATE) MG_RATE,SUM(ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT) ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT, SUM(TOT_SALE_AMT) TOT_SALE_AMT,SUM(SALE_PROF_AMT) SALE_PROF_AMT,SUM(PROFRATE) PROFRATE,SUM(P_TOT_SALE_AMT) P_TOT_SALE_AMT,SUM(CUST_CNT) CUST_CNT, SUM(CUST_CNT1) CUST_CNT1 FROM (SELECT F.PUMBUN_CD, PBN.PUMBUN_CD REP_PUMBUN_CD, PBN.PUMBUN_NAME , NVL(A.EVENT_FLAG, ' ') AS EVENT_FLAG , A.MG_RATE , 0 ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT , SUM(NVL(A.TOT_SALE_AMT,0)) AS TOT_SALE_AMT , SUM(NVL(A.SALE_PROF_AMT,0)) AS SALE_PROF_AMT , CASE WHEN SUM(NVL(A.TOT_SALE_AMT,0)) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((SUM(NVL(A.SALE_PROF_AMT,0))/SUM(NVL(A.TOT_SALE_AMT,0)))*100, 2) END AS PROFRATE , 0 P_TOT_SALE_AMT , SUM(CUST_CNT) CUST_CNT , 0 AS CUST_CNT1 FROM DPS.PS_DAYMGPBN A , DPS.PC_ORGMST B , DPS.PC_STRPBN F , DPS.PC_PBNMST PBN WHERE F.SALE_ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD AND A.STR_CD(+) = F.STR_CD AND A.PUMBUN_CD(+) = F.PUMBUN_CD AND PBN.PUMBUN_CD = F.PUMBUN_CD AND A.STR_CD = ? AND A.SALE_DT(+) >= ? AND A.SALE_DT(+) <= ? AND F.PUMBUN_CD IN ( SELECT MYORG.PUMBUN_CD FROM COM.V_MYORG MYORG WHERE MYORG.USER_ID = ? ) GROUP BY F.PUMBUN_CD , PBN.PUMBUN_NAME , A.EVENT_FLAG , A.EVENT_RATE , A.MG_RATE , F.SALE_ORG_CD ,PBN.PUMBUN_CD
UNION ALL
SELECT F.PUMBUN_CD, --PBN.REP_PUMBUN_CD, --전체구분없어지면서 대표브랜드코드로 맵핑없앰 PBN.PUMBUN_CD REP_PUMBUN_CD, PBN.PUMBUN_NAME , '' AS EVENT_FLAG , 0 MG_RATE , SUM(ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT) ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT , 0 AS TOT_SALE_AMT , 0 AS SALE_PROF_AMT , 0 AS PROFRATE , 0 AS P_TOT_SALE_AMT , 0 AS CUST_CNT , 0 AS CUST_CNT1 FROM DPS.PS_ACTPUMBUN A , DPS.PC_ORGMST B , DPS.PC_STRPBN F , DPS.PC_PBNMST PBN WHERE F.SALE_ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD AND A.STR_CD(+) = F.STR_CD AND A.PUMBUN_CD(+) = F.PUMBUN_CD AND PBN.PUMBUN_CD = F.PUMBUN_CD AND A.STR_CD = ? AND A.EXE_DT(+) >= ? AND A.EXE_DT(+) <= ? AND F.PUMBUN_CD IN ( SELECT MYORG.PUMBUN_CD FROM COM.V_MYORG MYORG WHERE MYORG.USER_ID = ? ) GROUP BY F.PUMBUN_CD , PBN.PUMBUN_NAME , F.SALE_ORG_CD ,PBN.PUMBUN_CD
UNION ALL
SELECT F.PUMBUN_CD, PBN.PUMBUN_CD REP_PUMBUN_CD, PBN.PUMBUN_NAME , NVL(A.EVENT_FLAG, ' ') AS EVENT_FLAG , A.MG_RATE , 0 AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT , 0 AS TOT_SALE_AMT , 0 AS SALE_PROF_AMT , 0 AS PROFRATE , NVL(SUM(TOT_SALE_AMT),0) P_TOT_SALE_AMT , 0 CUST_CNT , SUM(CUST_CNT) AS CUST_CNT1 FROM DPS.PS_DAYMGPBN A , DPS.PC_ORGMST B , DPS.PC_STRPBN F , DPS.PC_PBNMST PBN WHERE F.SALE_ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD AND A.STR_CD(+) = F.STR_CD AND A.PUMBUN_CD(+) = F.PUMBUN_CD AND PBN.PUMBUN_CD = F.PUMBUN_CD AND A.STR_CD = ? AND A.SALE_DT(+) >= ? AND A.SALE_DT(+) <= ? AND F.PUMBUN_CD IN ( SELECT MYORG.PUMBUN_CD FROM COM.V_MYORG MYORG WHERE MYORG.USER_ID = ? ) GROUP BY F.PUMBUN_CD , PBN.PUMBUN_NAME , A.EVENT_FLAG , A.EVENT_RATE , A.MG_RATE , F.SALE_ORG_CD ,PBN.PUMBUN_CD ) GROUP BY PUMBUN_CD,REP_PUMBUN_CD,PUMBUN_NAME ) X ) H WHERE 1=1
) A, DPS.PC_STRPBN B, DPS.PC_ORGMST C, DPS.PC_ORGMST D, DPS.PC_ORGMST E, DPS.PC_ORGMST F WHERE A.M_PUMBUN_CD1 = B.PUMBUN_CD AND SUBSTR(B.SALE_ORG_CD,1,8) LIKE ?||?||?||?||'%' AND SUBSTR(B.SALE_ORG_CD,1,2)||'00000000' = C.ORG_CD AND SUBSTR(B.SALE_ORG_CD,1,4)||'000000' = D.ORG_CD AND SUBSTR(B.SALE_ORG_CD,1,6)||'0000' = E.ORG_CD AND SUBSTR(B.SALE_ORG_CD,1,8)||'00' = F.ORG_CD AND (ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT <> 0 OR TOT_SALE_AMT <> 0 OR P_TOT_SALE_AMT <> 0 OR CUST_CNT <> 0) GROUP BY SALE_ORG_CD,C.ORG_NAME,D.ORG_NAME,E.ORG_NAME,F.ORG_NAME,M_PUMBUN_CD1,A.PUMBUN_CD, PUMBUN_NM, BRAND_TYPE,EVENT_FLAG,MG_RATE,A.PUMBUN_ORDER,F.SORT_ORDER ORDER BY STR_CD,SORT_ORDER,PUMBUN_NM,PUMBUN_ORDER

AND EXISTS ( SELECT MYORG.USER_ID FROM COM.V_MYORG MYORG WHERE MYORG.STR_CD = B.STR_CD AND MYORG.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD AND MYORG.TEAM_CD = B.TEAM_CD AND MYORG.PC_CD = B.PC_CD AND MYORG.PUMBUN_CD = A.PUMBUN_CD AND MYORG.USER_ID = ? ) GROUP BY F.PUMBUN_CD , F.PUMBUN_NAME , A.EVENT_FLAG , A.EVENT_RATE , A.MG_RATE ) X ) ORDER BY PUMBUN_NM, PUMBUN_ORDER
AND A.PUMBUN_CD IN (SELECT PUMBUN_CD FROM DPS.PC_STRPBN WHERE SUBSTR(BUY_ORG_CD,1,6) IN (SELECT SUBSTR(ORG_CD,1,6) FROM DPS.PC_ORGMST WHERE ORG_NAME LIKE ?||'%'))
